üöÄCommon Issues & Solutions

App Not Loading / Crashing

  • Force close and restart the Slay app
  • Check for app updates in the App Store
  • Restart your device (the classic solution that actually works)
  • Ensure you have iOS 14.0 or later

AI Coach Not Responding

  • Check your internet connection (even AI needs WiFi)
  • Verify you haven't hit your monthly roast limit
  • Try refreshing the chat or restarting the app
  • If you're premium, make sure your subscription is active

Goals & Habit Tracking Issues

  • Sync issues? Pull down to refresh your goal list
  • Missing data? Check if you're logged into the same account
  • Photos not uploading? Ensure camera permissions are enabled
  • Progress not saving? Force close and reopen the app

Subscription & Premium Features

  • Subscriptions are managed through the App Store
  • Not seeing premium features? Restore purchases in app settings
  • Billing questions? Contact Apple Support directly
  • Account issues? Email us with your purchase details

Notification Problems

  • Enable notifications in iOS Settings > Notifications > Slay
  • Check if "Do Not Disturb" is blocking your reality checks
  • Our morning roasts need permission to wake you up
  • Evening summaries require notification access
